Name: Paresh Chandra Pothal

Projects.Name: Anubandh : Alumini Networking System
Projects.Description: Collaboratively developed an Alumni Networking System with my team using the MERN stack. The platform includes features like donation options, year-wise event categorization, and many more to enhance alumni engagement and networking.

Projects.Name: File Inventory System
Projects.Description: Worked collaboratively with my team to build a File Inventory System using the MERN stack. The system simplifies file organization with features like secure file storage, advanced search capabilities, and a user-friendly interface.

Projects.Name: Code Compiler
Projects.Description: Developed a Code Compiler that allows users to compile and run HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code directly in the browser. The project features a real-time editor and output display.

Projects.Name: E-Commerce Website
Projects.Description: Developed an E-Commerce Website using the MERN stack, providing features like user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

Projects.Name: TechXpert
Projects.Description: Created Tech Expert, a platform connecting teachers and students for learning tech-related subjects, using the MERN stack. The system allows teachers to easily upload videos and students to access content after a simple login. It features a dashboard to track student performance and includes a job-finding system where students can directly connect with companies and explore job opportunities
